description: When my friends and I used to play M.o.O.2 we knew this one guy who would disable tactical combat, but that took all of the strategy out of the game and turned it into a logistics game. Without tactical combat a 4X becomes all about optimizing the game's best build order and what random start you get. Replayability in M.o.O.2 came from the "sidegrade" technologies and making different decisions based on different situations. All this remake game does is make you try to make the biggest stack of ships faster than the opponent. There isn't any reason to be different, so there's no reason to play twice.
summary: misses the point of the original
